# meta-cloud-api

> TypeScript SDK wrapper for Meta's WhatsApp Cloud API

meta-cloud-api provides a type-safe, comprehensive, and modular way to integrate WhatsApp Business Platform into Node.js applications.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/getting-started/introduction): Overview of the SDK
- [Installation](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/getting-started/installation): Setup guide
- [Quick Start](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/getting-started/quick-start): Send your first message
- [Configuration](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/getting-started/configuration): Advanced configuration

## API Reference

- [Messages](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/messages): Send text, media, template, interactive messages
- [Media](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/media): Upload, download, manage media files
- [Templates](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/templates): Create and manage message templates
- [Flows](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/flows): Interactive data collection flows
- [Phone Numbers](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/phone-numbers): Manage business phone numbers
- [Business Profile](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/business-profile): Manage business profile
- [QR Codes](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/qr-codes): Create QR codes with prefilled messages
- [Groups](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/groups): Create and manage WhatsApp groups
- [WABA](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/waba): WhatsApp Business Account management
- [Registration](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/registration): Register/deregister phone numbers
- [Two-Step Verification](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/two-step-verification): 2SV PIN management
- [Encryption](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/encryption): Business encryption keys
- [Calling](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/calling): Voice calling configuration
- [Commerce Settings](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/commerce-settings): Cart and catalog settings
- [Marketing Messages](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/marketing-messages): Marketing endpoint
- [Payments](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/payments): Payment configurations (India)
- [Block Users](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/api/block-users): Block/unblock users

## Webhooks

- [Overview](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/webhooks/overview): Webhook concepts
- [Verification](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/webhooks/verification): Webhook verification setup
- [Express](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/webhooks/express): Express.js webhook integration
- [Next.js](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/webhooks/nextjs): Next.js webhook integration
- [Custom](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/webhooks/custom): Custom webhook handlers

## Framework Guides

- [Express.js](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/express): Express.js integration
- [Next.js App Router](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/nextjs-app): Next.js App Router integration
- [Next.js Pages Router](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/nextjs-pages): Next.js Pages Router integration
- [Testing](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/testing): Testing guide
- [Error Handling](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/error-handling): Error handling strategies
- [Deployment](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/guides/deployment): Production deployment

## Type Reference

- [Message Types](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/types/message-types): Message TypeScript types
- [Webhook Types](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/types/webhook-types): Webhook event types
- [Config Types](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/types/config-types): Configuration types
- [Enums](https://meta-cloud-api.xyz/types/enums): SDK enums reference
